Package com.ftp.client

Class TerminalEmulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ftp.client.TerminalEmulator

  • public class TerminalEmulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Old style linux terminal emulator used for directly executing basic commands to remote FTP server. Also supports basic terminal commands like cd, pwd, ls...
